info.name: Digital Spy - Blue-17 V02
info.additionalInfo:
Main changes:

Some fonts changed to Trebuchet MS
Width of Date/Time boxes widened slightly
Date/time text made smaller but Black and Bold to make as much as possible visible
(If they reformat the date/time, reducing the amount of text, I will enlarge the font a bit)
Some of the heading fonts reduced in size
No colour changes
